New Records: Glenn Maxwell broke the record for the fastest century in the 50-over World Cup history, beating Aiden Markram's 49-ball hundred
Key Match Events: Australia thrashed the Netherlands by 309 runs
David Warner made 104, and Glenn Maxwell produced a blistering 106 off 44 balls
Logan van Beek removed Warner for 91-ball hundred
Adam Zampa claimed three for eight runs to hasten the Netherlands' collapse
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Netherlands suffered the biggest defeat in the tournament's history
Bas de Leede bled 115 runs in his 10 overs, including 28 runs in his final over
Australia plundered 131 runs in the final 10 overs
Others: Travis Head continued his recovery from a fractured hand
Mitchell Marsh retained his place as David Warner's opening partner
